boardgame.name: Valeria: Wioski
Villages of Valeria
boardgame.description: A village-building card game set in the world of Valeria. Establish resources, construct buildings, and attract adventurers to your Village to be crowned the next capitol city._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player takes a turn taking one action from the following list and all other players may follow the action but with fewer rewards:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Tax: Take 1 Gold and Draw 1 Card. (Follow: Draw 1 card.)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Harvest: Draw 3 Cards. (Follow: Draw 1 card.)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Develop: Discard 1 card to add a Resource to your village. (Follow: Discard 2 cards to add a Resource to your village.)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Build: Add a building to your village. Draw a card. (Follow: Add a building to your village, but do not draw a card.)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Recruit: Pay 1 Gold to add an Adventurer to your village. (Follow: Pay 2 Gold to add an Adventurer to your village.)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Building cards can be used for 2 reasons. 1) Pay resources to add it to your village as a building and gain its benefit and VP. 2) Develop it as a Resource and place it under your Castle card._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;When building, use resources you have developed or pay another player 1 Gold to use their resource._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends when a player has built or recruited 10 buildings/Adventurers._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: ***NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER*** Villages of Valeria is expected to ship from the publisher in Q4, 2016. This listing is for the Deluxe Edition of Villages of Valeria. It includes everything from the standard game, plus: Kickstarter Bonus Pack (4 Adventurer Cards, 8 Events Card, 1 Reference Card) Expansion Pack #1: Guild Halls Expansion Pack #2: Monuments plus more! Shipping to be determined when the game arrives from the publisher. Let us know if you have any questions.

This listing is for jhollander1987 only. This game is the Deluxe Kickstarter edition. Comes in the larger box with the Kickstarter exclusive bonus pack and the 2 expansions Guild Halls and Monuments. NIS, smoke and pet free. Please contact me for shipping specifics. Have a look at my other games for combined shipping. Thanks.

Now in stock. This listing is for the Deluxe Edition of Villages of Valeria. It includes everything from the standard game, plus: Kickstarter Bonus Pack (4 Adventurer Cards, 8 Events Card, 1 Reference Card) Expansion Pack #1: Guild Halls Expansion Pack #2: Monuments plus more! Shipping is approximately two pounds (about .9 kg). Let us know if you have any questions.
Kickstarter Deluxe Edition, new in shrink. Sold to wilderness via Cancon virtual flea market. For handover at Cancon 2017.

Outer shrink wrap removed to look inside, but cards are still in shrink. This deluxe KS edition comes with everything upgraded, and included all 3 expansions and an outer box sleeve. Shipping will probably be between $7-10 (or possibly less), depending on where you live. It is a hassle for me to ship outside of the USA, but I will do it for an extra $5 added to the total.
